ygData.subject: Re: Murderous Merchant In Akanon.
ygData.msgSnippet: The only robes that cannot be traded are the newbie robe, jr apprentiace robe, and sr apprentace robe.  the rest can be traded, sold, or dropped :) Nevyn ...
ygData.messageBody:
The only robes that cannot be traded are the newbie robe, jr apprentiace
robe, and sr apprentace robe. the rest can be traded, sold, or dropped :)

Nevyn
-----Original Message-----
From: SuperFreak [mailto:supermario@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 4:11 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Murderous Merchant In Akanon.


Watch out, I just decided to test a Gnomish Warrior out 1 day(it does
suck btw :P)
Anyways, I saw 2 elves die, there is a Elf KoSer merchant at the VERY
FRONT of Ak'Anon, there is no way around it, right when U enter the city
part(after the zone by about 4 steps) you hit a wall, this merchant is right
by the wall, the only way I see to get in Ak'Anon around this crazy merchant
is to:
1) Have Someone get it for you that is not an ELF(High Elf or Wood Elf,
not sure about Half-Elves, but I dont believe thise affects them)
2) Or, you can get someone to group teleport you in there(you're prolly
gonna take number 1, cuz noone can currently group teleport, that I know of
atleast, eheheh)
3) Yes, I know this sux! Its gonna be hard for me, but all I am gonna do
is make a gnomish character with HIGH charisma and get him some money and
then buy my spells then transfer it after walking to Kelethin or Felwithe or
whatnot!
-Malvos of The Rathe
Don Bickner wrote:

Hello fellow Wizards, A wood elf friend of mine was recently KOS
immediatly upon entering Akanon by a Merchant. He wasnt able to get the name
of this npc though. Does anyone know the name of this npc so I can steer
clear of him. I need to go to Akanon to get my lightning spell soon.
Another question. Has anyone had sucsess in getting a black robe from neriak
by having friend get it and then giving consent to loot his corpse? This
was discussed here a while ago and was wondering if it was indeed possible
to do. If robes cannot be traded and/or sold (even ones from najena or the
thatamurgist) this seems like a serious bug since these robes are valuable
to us casters but not to others and they would likely want to sell them if
they(non-casters) got those robes. Any thoughts?
